tasks.label: Start archodex-backend-dev pod in Kubernetes cluster

tasks.command: eval $(aws configure export-credentials --profile archodex-dev-AdministratorAccess --format env) && GITHUB_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) && act --platform ubuntu-latest-arm64=catthehacker/ubuntu:act-latest --platform ubuntu-latest=catthehacker/ubuntu:act-latest --container-architecture linux/arm64 --bind --env AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --env AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --env AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=$AWS_SESSION_TOKEN --env AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION --env GITHUB_TOKEN=$GITHUB_TOKEN --secret ARCHODEX_BACKEND_AWS_ROLE_ARN='${config:archodex.ARCHODEX_BACKEND_AWS_ROLE_ARN}' --job deploy
tasks.label: act: Run GitHub Actions Workflow deploy.yml locally for dev
